PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-12682014-11-20,  ,  ,  EC,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Declaring that the Reduction of Carbon Dioxide Emissions from Coal-fired Generation of Electricity Regulations Do Not Apply in Nova Scotia
PrecisOrder Declaring that the REDUCTION OF CARBON DIOXIDE EMISSIONS FROM COAL-FIRED GENERATION OF ELECTRICITY REGULATIONS DO NOT APPLY IN NOVA SCOTIA in order to minimize regulatory duplication and financial burden for the electricity producer in Nova Scotia by suspending the application of federal regulations on Greenhouse gas emissions from coal-fired electricity generation in Nova Scotia.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0265 Publication Date: 2014-12-03
AttachmentsAttachment
